source:
transition;close
change_background;Sky Evening
if;game.check_alive('Cacti')
    multi_add_portrait;Timothy;Left;Sages;MidRight;Cacti;FarRight
    transition;open
    speak;Cacti;We did it... whew!
    speak;Timothy;Thanks for the help.|Should be smooth sailing from here.
    speak;Sages;I do feel slightly bad...|That guy cared about his leader...
    speak;Cacti;Then he ought to have realised how stupid attacking us was.|If he really cared, he should have just lived.
    speak;Sages;...;FLAG(no_talk)
    speak;Timothy;I believe you two should rest, we might have trouble when we arrive...
    speak;Sages;Thank you, sir.
else
    multi_add_portrait;Timothy;Left;Sages;Right
    expression;Timothy;CloseEyes
    speak;Sages;Sir...
    speak;Timothy;I... Couldn't...
    speak;Sages;I'm very sorry... It's my fault for dragging her into this...
    speak;Timothy;Yes, it is.|But, she was her own girl...|I couldn't stop her seeking adventure.
    speak;Sages;Will you turn back?
    speak;Timothy;I'll see you to Aurelia, lest this be for nothing...|I'll bury her in her mother's homeland...|However will I explain this...
    speak;Sages;...;FLAG(no_talk)
end
transition;close
multi_remove_portrait;Sages;Cacti;Timothy
if;game.check_alive('Apple') and unit.team('Apple') == player
    multi_add_portrait;Apple;Right;Sages;Left
    transition;open
    speak;Apple;So, you're the leader?
    speak;Sages;You were out there helping us, how did you...?
    if;unit.team('Boey') == player and unit.team('Angel') == player
        speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Boey and Angel for a while.
    elif;unit.team('Angel') != player
        speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Boey for a while.
    else
        speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Angel for a while.
    end
    speak;Sages;Well, glad you're with us.|Nice hat!
    speak;Apple;Ha! You know the finer things in life.|I'll work as hard as will keep trouble off our backs.
    speak;Sages;Glad to hear.
    speak;Apple;Apple's the name.
    speak;Sages;Like the fruit...?
    speak;Apple;My parents were hardly creative.|Probably just named me after the first thing they had on the table.
    speak;Sages;Well, we should be landing soon, so get ready!
    speak;Apple;Sure thing. Later.
    transition;close
end
if;game.turncount < 11
    give_bexp;150
end
